meanings.definition: Domineering or dictatorial in manner or attitude.
meanings.sent1: The overbearing teacher always told the students what to do without listening to their ideas.
meanings.sent2: Her overbearing behavior made it difficult for others to express their opinions.
meanings.sent3: The overbearing boss tried to control every aspect of his employees' work, even down to the color of their pens.
meanings.sent4: The overbearing storm clouds darkened the sky, ready to unleash their power.
meanings.sent5: The overbearing heat of the desert sun beat down relentlessly on the travelers.
